reauth_confirm.title: [%key:common::config_flow::title::reauth%]
reauth_confirm.description: The Lyric integration needs to re-authenticate your account.

removed_yaml.title: The Honeywell Lyric YAML configuration has been removed
removed_yaml.description:
Configuring Honeywell Lyric using YAML has been removed.

Your existing YAML configuration is not used by Home Assistant.

Remove the YAML configuration from your configuration.yaml file and restart Home Assistant to fix this issue.
